entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near midnight changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 1900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
